Traits.Name: Slow
Traits.Description: Go after all other characters. If multiple characters take slow turns, it takes the same order as regular turns (ally/enemy/ally).

Traits.Name: Vigilance
Traits.Description: Foes can’t dash in your engagement and can’t move through your space.

Interrupts.Name: Guardian
Interrupts.Description: When an ally you can see in range 3 is targeted by an attack, you can dash up to 2 spaces towards that ally, ignoring vigilance. Then, if you’re adjacent, you can change the target of the attack to you.

Actions.Name: Sweep
Actions.Hit: Deal light damage and inflict daze. If a character is already dazed, they must physical save or also be stunned.

Actions.Name: Shove
Actions.Description: Adjacent foe is shoved 1, and must save or be shoved 1 again.

Actions.Name: Wallop
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe makes a save or takes heavy damage and becomes winded and are shoved 2. On a a successful save, they take light damage and are shoved 1.
